description: workmen breaking up building blocks and loading them on a wagon, with a large pile of blocks at center of image; buildings in background; overturned wheelbarrow, LRC
inscription:
Signature, Inscription and Stamp

bottom center, in pencil: [(illegible)]; URC, in pencil: [L.B.14.]; bottom center on back, in pencil: [24112c]
markings: bottom center in margin, stamped in red: [AL] [Lepère stamp, Lugt 141]
provenance: [Conrad R. Graber Fine Art, Riverwood, Maryland, until 2004; sold in April for ATO, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2004-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LRC, in the print: [A LEPERE]; LRC, in pencil: [A Lepère]
title: Workers Leveling Place Maubert
